meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'pittosporum', referring to multiple plants of this species.
meanings.sent1: We admired the row of pittosporums lining the pathway.
meanings.sent2: The pittosporums in the park provide shade on sunny days.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels play hide-and-seek among the pittosporums.
meanings.sent4: The garden looked like a forest of pittosporums under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The pittosporums whispered secrets to each other in the gentle breeze.
